Class Chess

java.lang.Object
chess.Chess
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rules
public class Chess extends Object implements Rules
A simple game of chess created by Neil Kingdom using the java.awt and javax.swing libraries

      Calls ruleSet and decides new placement of players
      Parameters:

      underAttack - : The specific opponent under attack
